mapper.select: SELECT LR.REQ_NO, LR.SUBJECT_CODE, LR.LEC_NAME, U.USER_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, LR.REQ_DATE, LR.STATUS, LR.REJ_REASON, L.LEC_NO FROM LECTURE_REQ LR JOIN SUBJECT S ON LR.SUBJECT_CODE = S.SUBJECT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LR.USER_NO = P.USER_NO JOIN TB_USER U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON LR.REQ_NO = L.REQ_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_REF F ON LR.FILE_REF_NO = F.FILE_REF_NO WHERE LR.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY LR.REQ_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT LR.REQ_NO, LR.SUBJECT_CODE, LR.LEC_NAME, U.USER_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, LR.REQ_DATE, LR.STATUS, LR.REJ_REASON, U.USER_NO FROM LECTURE_REQ LR JOIN SUBJECT S ON LR.SUBJECT_CODE = S.SUBJECT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LR.USER_NO = P.USER_NO JOIN TB_USER U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_REF F ON LR.FILE_REF_NO = F.FILE_REF_NO WHERE LR.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY LR.REQ_NO

SELECT LR.REQ_NO, LR.SUBJECT_CODE, LR.LEC_NAME, LR.REQ_DATE, LR.STATUS, LR.REJ_REASON, LR.LEC_CATEGORY, LR.PRE_DAY, LR.PRE_TIME, LR.PRE_CLASSRM, LR.MAX_CAPACITY, LR.FILE_REF_NO, U.USER_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, L.LEC_NO FROM LECTURE_REQ LR JOIN SUBJECT S ON LR.SUBJECT_CODE = S.SUBJECT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LR.USER_NO = P.USER_NO JOIN TB_USER U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON LR. REQ_NO = L.REQ_NO WHERE LR.REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
SELECT REQ_NO, SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME, USER_NAME, LEC_NAME, REQ_DATE, STATUS FROM TB_LECTURE WHERE STATUS = '승인'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_REQ ( REQ_NO, SUBJECT_CODE, USER_NO, PRE_DAY, PRE_TIME, PRE_CLASSRM, STATUS, REJ_REASON, REQ_DATE, MAX_CAPACITY, FILE_REF_NO, LEC_NAME, LEC_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( 'REQ' || LPAD(SEQ_LECTURE_REQ.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), #{subjectCode}, #{userNo}, #{preDay}, #{preTime}, #{preClassrm}, '대기', NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{maxCapacity}, #{fileRefNo}, #{lecName}, #{lecCategory} )
mapper.select: SELECT SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJECT_NAME FROM SUBJECT WHERE LENGTH(TRIM(SUBJECT_CODE)) > 0 AND LENGTH(TRIM(SUBJECT_NAME)) > 0 ORDER BY SUBJECT_NAME ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE LECTURE_REQ SET STATUS = '취소' WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
mapper.select: SELECT L.LEC_NO, LR.LEC_NAME AS LR_LEC_NAME, L.REQ_NO AS REQ_NO, L.CURRENT_ENROLLMENT, L.LEC_STATUS, L.LR_NO, L.USER_NO, S.SUBJECT_CODE, S.DEPARTMENT_NO, S.GRADE_LEVEL, S.SUBJECT_NAME, S.CREDIT, S.SUBJECT_DESP, S.SEMESTER_NO FROM LECTURE L JOIN LECTURE_REQ LR ON L.REQ_NO = LR.REQ_NO JOIN SUBJECT S ON LR.SUBJECT_CODE = S.SUBJECT_CODE WHERE L.USER_NO = #{profNo} AND L.LEC_STATUS = 'OPEN' ORDER BY L.LEC_NO

SELECT LR.REQ_NO, LR.SUBJECT_CODE, LR.LEC_NAME, U.USER_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, LR.REQ_DATE, LR.STATUS, LR.REJ_REASON, L.LEC_NO FROM LECTURE_REQ LR JOIN SUBJECT S ON LR.SUBJECT_CODE = S.SUBJECT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LR.USER_NO = P.USER_NO JOIN TB_USER U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON LR.REQ_NO = L.REQ_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_REF F ON LR.FILE_REF_NO = F.FILE_REF_NO WHERE LR.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY LR.REQ_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
